trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Vista
There were no other sightings in Vista on or around August 31st 1996
divs: sighting detailsi had moved into my apartment, but had not completed the assembly of my bed frame. my matress was on the floor against the wall that had a window. the night had become increasingly hot, so i had left the window open above my bed. after laying in my bed for about an hour; it was clear that the draft did not seem sufficent for my comfort, so i had decided to take off the window screen to get more air. i looked at my red digital clock that was sitting next to my t.v., it had read "1:4?"(i can not recall the exact minute but it was in the 40 range) it was a.m. when i fell asleep. i remember waking up in what seemed like a incredibly lucid dream. but it appeared very real. so real in fact, that i could feel the grit and pebbles on the road that i had awaken upon in the middle of nowhere. i felt in a heavy daze, like a dreamy hangover of some sort. it was night and there was tall grass fields on either side of the road. the wind was blowing through the grass and the sky was clear with stars. i looked in either direction of the road and it seemed to go for miles in either direction. there was no lights or signs of civilization on any part of the horizon. i recall having to lay back down because i couldn't hold myself back up. i woke again, this time in my bed, but my head was on the other end of the matress. my back was laying against the wall and i could see a shadow that was being cast from a tungsten light that was adjacent to my housing unit. the shadow was a humanoid figure with an oval\almond shaped head with narrow shoulders. my body locked frozen in a panic, understanding that whatever was at my window was right above me. i closed my eyes in fear trying to shake what i thought was a dream. i opened my eyes once again and its head was swaying from side to side. my breathing was in short labored breaths, i closed my eyes again wishing it would go away. i opened my eyes again and the shadow was gone. my digital clock was changing times as if in fragments. 3:46. 7:43. 11:54. 9:12 etc.(note: these are not the exact minutes that had been displayed from my clock) and i could hear from the an open window of my nieghbors answering machine, that it was playing in full volume in jarbled segments of voice. i slowly lifted myself from my matress, and very carefully to the window and nothing appeared to be there, except a small red glowing orb (roughly the size of a ball bearing from the distance of approximatly 2 miles away to the west)that was gently lifting from the ground and rising competely vertical to the sky above,and eventually disappeared. the nieghbors answering machine had stopped and my clock read "4:17", i still felt slightly hazy, and had vomited sortly after. the two weeks following the event, i was experiencing unexplained nose bleeds and migraines. i had purchased a humidifier to help alleviate the problem of the bleeding but it continued to happen unexpectedly. the bleeding had stopped after that time, shortly after the migraines as well. what seem additionally odd about all of this is, i do not and did not have a history of migraines or nosebleeds.
